title: Ticket #5485: User interface lessons.
description:
Notes from the demo.

  • Bad time stamp format for --expiry?
  • The expiration date should be echoed back to the user in at least two different formats to confirm the lease duration/expiration.
  • If the expiration date is too far in the future, user should be prompted.
  • Too much jargon/detail in the current non --verbose output. (I think it's important to tell the user what we're about to do when we're about to do something blocking, but it could maybe be phrased better.)
